snippet: Attorneys Ted Olson and David Boies once argued the Bush v. Gore case in front of the U.S. Supreme Court, but they say fighting California's law prohibiting same-sex marriage is the most significant thing they've done....

headline.print_headline: Attorneys Promote Gay Marriage Doc at Sundance
headline.main: Attorneys Promote Gay Marriage Doc at Sundance

lead_paragraph: Attorneys Ted Olson and David Boies once argued the Bush v. Gore case in front of the U.S. Supreme Court, but they say fighting California's law prohibiting same-sex marriage is the most significant thing they've done.
